title: Ticket #6167: condor_q -reverse should imply -(better-)analyze
description:
On a recent RUST ticket, the end user was confused about using the -reverse flag. When condor_q -reverse is invoked, it should imply that some analysis is being done. Having it silently ignored was confusing to the user.

-reverse without analyze should implicitly invoke analysis. If that is not easy, perhaps an error message in this case.
